components.name: Callout
components.description: Highlight important information with icons and colored styling
components.documentation:
Callouts draw attention to important information. Each type has a different color and icon:
- **info**: Blue with info icon
- **success**: Green with checkmark
- **warning**: Yellow with warning icon
- **danger**: Red with exclamation
- **neutral**: Gray with gear icon

components.name: Card
components.description: Container for content with optional header, media, and footer
components.documentation:
Cards are flexible containers that can include:
- **Media**: First image becomes card media
- **Header**: First # heading becomes header
- **Content**: Main text content
- **Footer**: Trailing links become footer buttons

Appearances: outlined (default), filled, filled-outlined, plain, accent

components.name: Comparison
components.description: Before/after image comparison with draggable slider
components.documentation:
Interactive image comparison slider. Requires exactly 2 images:
- First image: 'before' slot
- Second image: 'after' slot
- Optional position parameter (0-100): Initial slider position

components.name: Carousel
components.description: Image slider or content rotator with navigation
components.documentation:
Carousel for sliding content. Use ~~~ to separate slides.

Parameters:
- **navigation**: Show prev/next arrows
- **pagination**: Show dot indicators
- **loop**: Enable infinite loop
- **autoplay**: Auto-advance slides
- **mouse-dragging**: Enable drag to slide
- **vertical**: Vertical orientation
- **scroll-hint:value**: Show scroll hint
- **aspect-ratio:value**: e.g., 16/9, 4/3
- **slide-gap:value**: Gap between slides
- **slides-per-page:n**: Slides visible at once
- **slides-per-move:n**: Slides to move at once

components.name: Details
components.example:
^^^
Click to expand
>>>
Hidden content here.
^^^
components.documentation:
Collapsible content section. Use >>> to separate summary from details.

Appearances: outlined (default), filled, filled-outlined, plain
Icon placement: end (default), start

components.name: Dialog
components.documentation:
Modal dialog component. Use >>> to separate trigger button text from dialog content.

Parameters:
- **light-dismiss**: Close when clicking outside
- **width**: Custom width (e.g., 600px, 50vw)

components.name: Tab Group
components.documentation:
Create tabbed content sections. Use +++ with tab title to define each tab.

Placements: top (default), bottom, start, end

components.name: Tag
components.documentation:
Small colored labels for categorization or status.

Variants: brand, success, neutral, warning, danger

components.name: Copy Button
components.description: Button that copies content to clipboard
components.documentation: Creates a button that copies the content to clipboard when clicked. Supports markdown formatting in display while preserving raw text for copying.

components.name: Badge
components.documentation:
Small badge indicators for status or counts.

Variants: brand, success, neutral, warning, danger

components.name: Button
components.documentation:
Styled button component. Include a markdown link to make it clickable.

Variants: brand, success, neutral, warning, danger
